unnormalised: Hey folks, interesting discussion! My grandpa in Kerala always said using too much pesticide ruins the soil. Remember that Onam harvest? Less pesticide, tastier payasam! Maybe we should look at traditional methods like they do in some Andhra villages. Less reliance on those expensive Rs. pesticides from multinational companies! Perhaps Krishi Vigyan Kendra can offer workshops? Thinking long term, you know?
